trans-unit.source: Scales an object in the three-dimensional x-y-z plane, starting from a defined center point.
trans-unit.target: 從已定義的中心點開始，縮放三維 X-Y-Z 平面中的物件。

trans-unit.source: Scale factors are defined in x-, y-, and z- directions from this center point.
trans-unit.target: 縮放比例是以從這個中心點延伸的 X、Y 和 Z 方向來定義。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.ScaleTransform3D" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.ScaleTransform3D" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.ScaleTransform3D" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.ScaleTransform3D" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Vector3D along which the transformation scales.
trans-unit.target: 轉換縮放時所沿著的 Vector3D。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.ScaleTransform3D" /> class using the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" />.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.ScaleTransform3D" />，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Vector3D along which the transformation scales.
trans-unit.target: 轉換縮放時所沿著的 Vector3D。

trans-unit.source: Center around which the transformation scales.
trans-unit.target: 轉換縮放時所圍繞的中心。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.ScaleTransform3D" /> class using the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" /> and <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D" />.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.ScaleTransform3D" /> 和 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" />，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Factor by which to scale the X value.
trans-unit.target: 縮放 X 值時所用的因數。

trans-unit.source: Factor by which to scale the Y value.
trans-unit.target: 縮放 Y 值時所用的因數。

trans-unit.source: Factor by which to scale the Z value.
trans-unit.target: 縮放 Z 值時所用的因數。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.ScaleTransform3D" /> class using the specified scale factors.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的縮放因數初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.ScaleTransform3D" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Factor by which to scale the X value.
trans-unit.target: 縮放 X 值時所用的因數。

trans-unit.source: Factor by which to scale the Y value.
trans-unit.target: 縮放 Y 值時所用的因數。

trans-unit.source: Factor by which to scale the Z value.
trans-unit.target: 縮放 Z 值時所用的因數。

trans-unit.source: X coordinate of the center point from which to scale.
trans-unit.target: 縮放時所根據之中心點的 X 座標。

trans-unit.source: Y coordinate of the center point from which to scale.
trans-unit.target: 縮放時所根據之中心點的 Y 座標。

trans-unit.source: Z coordinate of the center point from which to scale.
trans-unit.target: 縮放時所根據之中心點的 Z 座標。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.ScaleTransform3D" /> class using the specified center coordinates and scale factors.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的中心座標和縮放因數，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.ScaleTransform3D" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the x-coordinate of the transform's center point.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定轉換中心點的 X 座標。

trans-unit.source: The x-coordinate of the transform's center point.
trans-unit.target: 轉換中心點的 X 座標。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <c>0</c>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<c>0</c>。

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: 相依性屬性資訊

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 識別項欄位

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: 中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: 無

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.ScaleTransform3D.CenterX" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.ScaleTransform3D.CenterX" /> 相依性屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the z-coordinate of the transform's center point.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定轉換中心點的 Z 座標。

trans-unit.source: The y-coordinate of the transform's center point.
trans-unit.target: 轉換中心點的 Y 座標。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <c>0</c>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<c>0</c>。

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: 相依性屬性資訊

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 識別項欄位

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: 中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: 無

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.ScaleTransform3D.CenterY" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.ScaleTransform3D.CenterY" /> 相依性屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the z-coordinate of the transform's center point.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定轉換中心點的 Z 座標。

trans-unit.source: The z-coordinate of the transform's center point.
trans-unit.target: 轉換中心點的 Z 座標。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <c>0</c>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<c>0</c>。

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: 相依性屬性資訊

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 識別項欄位

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: 中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: 無

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.ScaleTransform3D.CenterZ" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.ScaleTransform3D.CenterZ" /> 相依性屬性。

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.ScaleTransform3D" />, making deep copies of this object's values.
trans-unit.target: 建立這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.ScaleTransform3D" /> 的可修改複製品，深層複製這個物件的值。

trans-unit.source: When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
trans-unit.target: 當複製相依性屬性時，這個方法會複製資源參考和資料繫結 (但可能無法再解析)，但不會複製動畫或它們目前的值。

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 目前物件的可修改複本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property will be <see langword="false" /> even if the source's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property was <see langword="true." />
trans-unit.target: 即使來源的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 屬性為 <see langword="true." />，複製物件的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 屬性將仍為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 這個方法用來產生的可修改複本凍結<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件)。

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 為了方便起見，這個方法會遮蔽強型別實作繼承的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.ScaleTransform3D" /> object, making deep copies of this object's current values.
trans-unit.target: 建立這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.ScaleTransform3D" /> 物件的可修改複製品，製作這個物件目前值的深層複本。

trans-unit.source: Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.
trans-unit.target: 不會複製資源參考、資料繫結和動畫，但是會複製其目前值。

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 目前物件的可修改複本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property will be <see langword="false" /> even if the source's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property was <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 即使來源的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 屬性為 <see langword="false" />，複製物件的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 屬性將仍為 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 這個方法用來產生的可修改複本凍結<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件)。

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 為了方便起見，這個方法會遮蔽強型別實作繼承的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the scale factor in the x-direction.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 X 方向的縮放比例。

trans-unit.source: Scale factor in the x-direction.
trans-unit.target: X 方向的縮放比例。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <c>1</c>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<c>1</c>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the scale factor in the y-direction.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 Y 方向的比例因素。

trans-unit.source: Scale factor in the y-direction.
trans-unit.target: Y 方向的比例因素。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <c>1</c>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<c>1</c>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the scale factor in the z-direction.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 Z 方向的縮放比例。

trans-unit.source: Scale factor in the z-direction.
trans-unit.target: Z 方向的縮放比例。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <c>1</c>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<c>1</c>。

trans-unit.target: 無

trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.ScaleTransform3D.ScaleZ" /> 相依性屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Matrix3D" /> representation of this transformation.
trans-unit.target: 取得這個轉換的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Matrix3D" /> 表示。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Matrix3D" /> representation of this transformation.
trans-unit.target: 這個轉換的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Matrix3D" /> 表示。
